text: The 2018 Atlantic Sun Women's Basketball Tournament was the 32nd edition of the Atlantic Sun Conference Championship. It took place from March 2, 7 and 11, 2018 in several arenas at campus sites.http://asunsports.org/sports/wbkb/2017-18/files/2018_WBB_Bracket.pdf ==Format== The ASUN Championship is a three-day single-elimination tournament. Eight teams competed in the championship, with the higher seeded team in each matchup hosting the game. ==Seeds== {| class="wikitable" style="white- space:nowrap; font-size:90%;" ! Seed ! School ! Conference ! Overall !
